thread.title: Tributes as former chancellor Lord Geoffrey Howe dies
thread.title_full: Tributes as former chancellor Lord Geoffrey Howe dies - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tributes as former chancellor Lord Geoffrey Howe dies
text: Tributes to the former chancellor Lord Geoffrey Howe are being paid by politicians in Wales after he died from a suspected heart attack aged 88. The Conservative MP, who was born in Port Talbot and served under Margaret Thatcher, died on Friday night. Welsh Secretary Stephen Crabb said he was a "towering" political figure who always had a great affection for Wales. Welsh Tory Leader Andrew RT Davies called him a man of " great kindness and intellect " . Share this story About sharing
